item.description:
For those not heading out of town for the Columbus Day weekend, we'll be fleeing Beantown Saturday and Sunday in exploration of the Fall Fair(e)s north and south of the city.

On Sunday we'll be heading to that New England medieval phenomenon, King Richard's Faire. It's been a frequent request amongst our inquisitive crew, so by golly, we're finally going.

Check out the details at: http://kingrichardsfa...

Tickets are $25 at the gate, but one can print a $1 off coupon from the website: http://kingrichardsfa...

Was planning on meeting at the Bridgewater park and ride (http://www.ctps.org/p...) at 10 a.m. for carpooling into Carver as this has fairly easy access from 495, and from 24 (the route most folks will take from Boston to the faire). Parking is free, so you can also meet us there closer to the opening time of 10:30 a.m.

As is my norm, will be sending my cell phone number to my yes and maybe RSVP's a day or two in advance to faciliate locating each other at the park and ride or the faire. So sign up if ya wanna find us:-)

Any questions, contact Lisa
item.name: King Richards Faire
